name: Open Science Labs
description: The community open to science and technology.

projects.summary: ASTx is an agnostic expression structure that can be utilized across different programming languages to standardize abstract syntax tree (AST) representations.
Makim enhances target and dependency definitions by replacing traditional Makefile formatting with a more user-friendly YAML format, streamlining build processes.
PyDataStructs aims to provide a comprehensive Python package containing a variety of data structures and algorithms, including parallel implementations, to aid in data manipulation and processing.
Rago is designed as a lightweight framework to support Resource Allocation Graphs (RAG), facilitating better resource management in computing environments.
Sugar offers an organized approach to managing container stacks through a centralized configuration file and a user-friendly command line interface, aimed at simplifying container management tasks.

jina_response:
Title: GSoC Project Ideas - Open Science Labs

URL Source: https://opensciencelabs.org/opportunities/gsoc/project-ideas/

Markdown Content:
OSL Project Ideas for GSoC 2025 [#](https://opensciencelabs.org/opportunities/gsoc/project-ideas/#osl-project-ideas-for-gsoc-2025 "Permanent link")
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Welcome to the Open Science Labs (OSL) project ideas page for Google Summer of Code 2025. As an umbrella organization, OSL hosts links to the ideas pages of each member organization. You can explore these projects here.

At OSL, we've assembled a selection of project ideas that not only embody our mission but also provide enriching experiences for student and newcomers open-source developpers. These projects cover a variety of topics and technologies, catering to diverse interests. Below, we've outlined some potential project ideas we're considering for GSoC. We believe these projects provide students with a valuable chance to engage with open-source efforts and develop their skills under the mentorship of seasoned professionals.

This page details the sub-organizations available for GSoC 2025 participants. Applicants are welcome to reach out to us on our [Discord](https://opensciencelabs.org/discord) or directly contact the sub-oganization/project mentors.

Sub-Organizations [#](https://opensciencelabs.org/opportunities/gsoc/project-ideas/#sub-organizations "Permanent link")
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

_Note: Each organization includes a designated list of mentors. Please get in touch with them directly if you have any inquiries._

### ArxLang/ASTx [#](https://opensciencelabs.org/opportunities/gsoc/project-ideas/#arxlangastx "Permanent link")

*   **Description**: ASTx is an agnostic expression structure for AST. It is agnostic because it is not specific to any language.
*   **Project WEB Page**: [https://astx.arxlang.org/](https://astx.arxlang.org/)
*   **Project Ideas**: [link](https://github.com/arxlang/astx/wiki/Project-Ideas)

### Makim [#](https://opensciencelabs.org/opportunities/gsoc/project-ideas/#makim "Permanent link")

*   **Description**: Makim is based on **make** and focus on improving the way to define targets and dependencies. Instead of using the Makefile format, it uses yaml format.
*   **Project WEB Page**: [https://osl-incubator.github.io/makim/](https://osl-incubator.github.io/makim/)
*   **Project Ideas**: [link](https://github.com/osl-incubator/makim/wiki/Project-Ideas)

### PyDataStructs [#](https://opensciencelabs.org/opportunities/gsoc/project-ideas/#pydatastructs "Permanent link")

*   **Description**: PyDataStructs project aims to be a Python package for various data structures and algorithms (including their parallel implementations).
*   **Project WEB Page**: [https://pydatastructs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/](https://pydatastructs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/)
*   **Project Ideas**: [link](https://github.com/codezonediitj/pydatastructs/wiki/Google-Summer-of-Code-Project-Ideas)

### Rago [#](https://opensciencelabs.org/opportunities/gsoc/project-ideas/#rago "Permanent link")

*   **Description**: Rago is a lightweight framework for RAG.
*   **Project WEB Page**: [https://osl-incubator.github.io/rago/](https://osl-incubator.github.io/rago/)
*   **Project Ideas**: [link](https://github.com/osl-incubator/rago/wiki/Project-Ideas)

### Sugar [#](https://opensciencelabs.org/opportunities/gsoc/project-ideas/#sugar "Permanent link")

*   **Description**: Sugar organizes your stack of containers, gathering some useful scripts and keeping this information centralized in a configuration file with a friendly command line interface.
*   **Project WEB Page**: [https://osl-incubator.github.io/sugar/](https://osl-incubator.github.io/sugar/)
*   **Project Ideas**: [link](https://github.com/osl-incubator/sugar/wiki/Project-Ideas)
